title: MCCP 11: Operation Flywheel
body:
[MCCP 11](https://mips.mstable.org/MCCP/mccp-11) proposes to modify system configuration for a 6 week period, specifically the `govFee` and `RevenueRecipient` for `mUSD`, to redirect a large portion of system revenue to [Votium](https://votium.app/) in order to capitalise on the under-utilised vote bribing market and generate circular effects for `mUSD`.

**Should we move forward and create this as PDP-33?**
author: 0xE76Be9C1e10910d6Bc6b63D8031729747910c2f6
